page.title: 08PLAYING FOOTBALL.
page.content: My name is Robert Hill and I like playing football.My favourite team is Manchester United.Every Saturday I meet a group of friends on the local cricket field.Two teams are picked by the captains who toss a coin,(if we've got one,),to see who has first choice.4 coats are used for posts and one person from each team stands between each set of posts to prevent the other team from scoring.I play football wearing a kit of red shorts and a red and white shirt in the Liverpool colours.Some of the group don't have any kit,but this does'nt matter.Football boots are hard shoes with studs on the soles.They allow you to kick the ball very hard which you frequently have to do when passing the ball or shooting at the goals in the hope of scoring,which is the object of the game.
